aWLI_StateProvision.content: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1036\deflangfe2052{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;} {\info{\horzdoc}{\*\lchars ([\'7b\'a1\'a4\'a1\'ae\'a1\'b0\'a1\'b4\'a1\'b6\'a1\'b8\'a1\'ba\'a1\'be\'a1\'b2\'a1\'bc\'a3\'a8\'a3\'ae\'a3\'db\'a3\'fb\'a1\'ea\'a3\'a4}{\*\fchars !),.:\'3b?]\'7d\'a1\'a7\'a1\'a4\'a1\'a6\'a1\'a5\'a8\'44\'a1\'ac\'a1\'af\'a1\'b1\'a 1\'ad\'a1\'c3\'a1\'a2\'a1\'a3\'a1\'a8\'a1\'a9\'a1\'b5\'a1\'b7\'a1\'b9\'a1\'bb\'a1\'bf\'a1\'b3\'a1\'bd\'a3\'a1\'a3\'a2\'a3\'a7\'a3\'a9\'a3\'ac\'a3\'ae\'a3\'ba\'a3\'bb\'a3\'bf\'a3\'dd\'a3\'e0\'a3\'fc\'a3\'fd\'a1\'ab\'a1\'e9}} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\li15\qj\cf1\lang1033\expndtw2\f0\fs16 At the end of each 12 months in a continuous claim before age 65, \b benefits will be adjusted \b0 at a compounded rate to reflect annual changes in the Consumer Price Index. Each adjustment cannot be more than we would have paid if the CPI-U had increased exactly by the maximum increase percent, which you selected at 3%. Before you are age 65, there is no total limit on the amount of adjusted indemnity you can recei ve. \cf0\expndtw0\kerning2 \par par\cf1\expndtw2\kerning0 \par When you recover, whatever increase has been put into effect under the rider will remain as a permanent increase, at no extra premium cost to age 65. The cost of living adjustment rider applies to the Residual disability and the Social Insurance Subs titute riders, if selected. \cf0\expndtw0\kerning2 \par \par \cf1\expndtw1\kerning0\i Monthly Buying Power = Without 3% COLA Rider, assuming constant 3% increase in CPI-U each year\cf0\expndtw0\kerning2 \par \cf1\expndtw1\kerning0 Monthly Indemnity with 3% COLA Rider = Assumes constant 3% increase in CPI-U each year\cf0\expndtw0\kerning2 \par \cf1\expndtw1\kerning0 Cumulative Annual = Monthly Indemnity With 3% COLA Rider, assuming 3% increase in CPI-U each year
